sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './CardDeck.css'; import { Animated } from "react-animated-css"; class CardDeck extends React.Component { render() { return (
Indoor

Whether you prefer modern styling, classic, or a hybrid of the two, we design rooms where you and your loved ones will want to spend your time.

View More
Outdoor

Utilizing the natural environment, we create appealing, functional, and festive outdoor settings, adaptable to a variety of uses.

View More
Blended

Combine the best of both worlds, with seamless spaces that bring the comfort of home together with the tranquility of nature.

View More
{/* Indoor Modal */}
Indoor
Previous Next
{/* Outdoor Modal */}
Outdoor
Previous Next
{/* Blended Modal */}
Blended
Previous Next
) } } export default CardDeck;
